summary: A covert FBI agent infiltrates a ruthless gangster mob, but his life is at risk from a mysterious informant who funnels inside information to the hoodlums.
cast: Mark Stevens|Richard Widmark|Lloyd Nolan|Barbara Lawrence|Ed Begley|Donald Buka|Joseph Pevney|John McIntire|Walter Greaza|Howard Smith|Larry Anzalone|George Barrows|Joan Blair|James J. Casino|Lane Chandler|Dick Cherney|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Edmund Cobb|Vincent Donahue|Sam Edwards|Fred Fisher|Bruce Gordon|Fred Graham|Joe Gray|Kit Guard|Joe Haworth|Don Jessee|Robert Karnes|Johnny Kern|Mike Killian|Don Kohler|Lyle Latell|George Leonard|Jack Lomas|Marion Marshall|Billy Mauch|Roger McGee|Kitty McHugh|Joe McTurk|Lew Morphy|Robert Patten|Phillip Pine|Wally Rose|Wallace Scott|Sammy Shack|Dan Sheridan|Mickey Simpson|Randy Stuart|Brick Sullivan|Charles Tannen|Al Thompson|Philip Van Zandt|Kid Wagner|Billy Wayne|Robert B. Williams|Buddy Wright
title: La calle sin nombre
